website_summaries.verdict: Realistic design and sturdy build make this a kid and parent favorite. A great buy that can take tough playing.
pros: Fully functioning folding seat for a baby doll or stuffed animal
Crawlers can use it to start walking
cons: The handle on a few units came loose and slid back and forth

customer_reviews.title: Missing an important feature.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this but it was missing something that all real shipping carts have, bumpers. So, I went to home Depot and bought the corner protectors, they were supposed to stick but didnt. My husband agreed they were needed so he used zip ties to secure them.
customer_reviews.author: Jill out of the box

customer_reviews.title: On the very first time trying your sturdy metal cart
customer_reviews.text: Dear Melissa & Doug. My son is 2 1/2 and has Down syndrome. We have tried walkers and other push toys to help him learn to walk, but because he's so tall, the push toys don't allow him to stand up straight. On the very first time trying your sturdy metal cart, he walked across two rooms of the house. The cart is the perfect height for him. I can't thank you enough for making this product and will be sharing with my mom friends.
customer_reviews.author: David Wylie

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL OF HANDLE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shopping cart is the best on the market as far as realism and function...the only flaw is the the handle slides back and forth and has pinched my daughters hand really bad a couple of times..I fixed it by putting a bead of 100% clear silicone on both ends all the way around... I would suggest everyone do the same...p.s. Any clear silicone will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: House Destroyer!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is like a commercial heavy duty cart. My toddlers love it. But it will DESTROY your painted trim and painted kitchen cabinets! Chips and dents the hardwood enameled molding trim in my house. UGH! This thing could seriously be reduced to about 1/4 of the weight that is currently is. Way overdone. Wish I had bought a plastic cart. Plus, if they hit the dog or each other, this is gonna HURT.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy_Pants_Rants

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. My parent once bought my daughter a bright pink plastic shopping cart, that quickly lost a wheel and made me cringe every time I looked at it...But my 2 year old played with it all the time! I finally replaced it with this and could not be happier! It is nicer than Walmart's real shopping carts :) My 2.5 year old daughter loves putting her stuffed animals in this and cruising them around the house! It was a breeze to put together as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracking Packages

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and rolls so smoothly--but beware your walls and furniture.
customer_reviews.text: such a nice cart. Rolls so smoothly and easily. My kid cruise around the house with this. Looks so realistic and built very sturdy. My one criticism is that they should include some optional rubber bumpers for the front because they WILL scuff walls and furniture. This is study steel and kids don't slow down for walls. I added my own bumpers and attached them with zip ties and that has saved my house.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Super durable, doesn’t tip, kids love it... bought another one...
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about this when I ordered it... it was originally meant to help my baby walk, but it rolls too fast, so I had every intention of returning it, but then my toddlers saw it... they loved it so much, that they asked for another one... my husband was worried about having a jackass episode in our house, but so far we have only had baby dolls and groceries in the carts. It is super sturdy, strikingly similar to the durability of a real metal grocery store cart. It could probably dent a car... I will update if things change, but so far everything is going well, so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: parapsychick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but noisy!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids have had this for 6 years, and it's held up beautifully. At age 8 and 5, they still play with it as much as at age 1. It's a lovely toy. The only thing I didn't consider is that it's noisy! We have wood floors, and the wheels are noisy against the floor and it's quite loud with the metal when they bump into things, drop toys inside, etc. When we're hoping to sleep in Saturday morning, it's one of the few toys that we cringe when someone starts playing with it. If they love it, which they will, just be prepared for the noise and maybe to hide it once in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality - but please remember to be a good parent.
customer_reviews.text: High quality in every way. I carry it into the store because I don't want the parking lot to chew up the wheels. My kid loves it. It is also a useful tool for parents that raise their children to follow instructions, because the temptation to run around and act crazy with it is high. So yeah, you'll get some teachable moments. If you are not willing to be engaged with your kid - please don't buy your little angel this toy. We don't use it when stores are at a busy time.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This brand is supposed to be SO great. Well my husband has put together hundreds of items from Amazon, Wayfair, Overstock...and when he put this together, the red plastic piece that goes in front just snapped off, and was impossible to glue. Just junk. This was a Birthday gift & broke the day of our grandson’s party. We will never buy this brand again. Overpriced junk from China.
customer_reviews.author: lovetogutyou

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, good quality but NOISY!!! I wish we had gotten a quiet, plastic one.
customer_reviews.text: There is no doubt that this kid's sized shopping cart is cool. It's realistic, good quality, and built to last. It's great. BUT, after living with it for a year, my husband and I want to donate it. It's NOISY... very noisy on hardwood floors. My son likes to run around the living room, kitchen, and family room in a circle, over and over again. It is so noisy that we can't talk to each other when he's doing it. Talking on the phone is out of the question. I'm over the cool factor and wish we had purchased a less cool but far quieter plastic version.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kil

customer_reviews.title: High quality, space for a doll and food.
customer_reviews.text: This shopping cart is amazing. It's super high quality. Sturdy, heavy, and unlikely to tip over. My daugher's favorite toy. She can load up her shopping cart and put her baby in the basket and run around the house. The wheels spin freely and it's easy to maneuver. The only issue is the front is metal and will take a chunk out of any wooden furniture your child bangs it into. We busted out the zip ties and a pool noodle to make bumpers for the front of the cart. It's saved our walls from the damage our daughter has tried to inflict on them.
customer_reviews.author: Larson

customer_reviews.title: Durable great quality
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with Melissa and Doug. Their products are bar none the best. This shopping cart was well worth the money. I have bought previous ones a plastic and one metal around 19.99. they did not last 6 months. So decided I had to upgrade to something a lot better. This cart has lasted now over 2 months still looks new and she climbs in it and it holds her weight and she uses it for groceries, a doll carrier and it does wonderfully and I feel safe the riding in it. So durable for sure. Honestly better quality than a real shopping cart. Please invest you will not regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lea1345

customer_reviews.title: Solid metal, will destroy your home!
customer_reviews.text: If you feel like your home is just in too nice of shape, this shopping cart is for you! It is solid metal and your kids will enjoy crashing it into your doors, your cabinets, your walls, your furniture, etc. and no matter how many times you tell them you will take it away if they keep running into things, and then follow through, within 5 minutes of getting it back they will be destroying your home again. I guess there is a reason we don’t give toddlers real guns, knives, chainsaws etc. Who would have thought metal shopping carts would be in that same category!
customer_reviews.author: Not Assigned

customer_reviews.title: Realistic shopping cart that looks great
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, one of the wheels was bent and wobbles. However, it still works for the most part and not worth returning for the one issue. Also, the safety bars on the cart make it very difficult for children to push the cart on carpet so it was almost unusable (unless you have a strong child or grandchild). I did have to ask my Dad to shorten the safety bars so the cart could be used on the carpet. Other than that, it was a step up from the plastic shopping cart my granddaughter previously had.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleW

customer_reviews.title: VERY HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: This thing is legit and weighs almost as much as a full size real shopping cart. It’s solid metal and very well made. My daughter is 1.5 years old and with some lighter toys she pushes too hard on the handle and falls. Not the case with this because it’s a beast. Only downside is if anyone gets hit with this thing it’ll do some damage. I wouldn’t recommend if you have any glass cabinets anywhere in your home. They'll get shattered with even a slight bump with this. I kinda of wish I knew how heavy it was before I bought it. But at least it’s realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it and it’s super sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We take this shopping everywhere and always have people telling us how cute it is... daughter loves it and it’s super sturdy ... the best thing hands down I’ve gotten her ...not to mention she feels freedom and learns to follow instruction and great exercise for my toddler ... most played with toy we have bought
customer_reviews.author: Valarie c.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful secure and perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: This cart is as great as all Melissa and Doug toys specially because all these toys are made with high quality materials, it was very easy to assemble and it is super secure. I bought it for my daughter for her 2 year bday but also my 6 years old love it. I highly recommend this toy it doesn’t come with any additional items, as others but honestly who needs more cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Funny mama

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this cart. My son is 18 months and still is not walking. It is tall for him, and makes him reach and not lean on the cart, so it helps him learn to balance more instead of relying on the object to hold him up. It is built great. it is very sturdy. I had to add weights to it so it would not roll away so easily for my son, so he could pull up to it. It rolls so well, it goes easily on carpet. I added our local grocery store labels to ours for a little personalization...
customer_reviews.author: Amiela T.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our playroom!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. It is made with nice sturdy metal, and pretty easy to assemble. Looks like an authentic miniature grocery cart. My only regret is I waited too long to buy, and it is a bit too small for my now 6 year old daughter! I think a child 3-4 would be the best age/size for this. But she and I both love it regardless. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Will last for years. Quick/easy assembly. Basket is a little small as it stops shy of the front wheels. The three vertical stoppers (with the black caps) prevented my granddaughter from pushing the cart to a lower level. Wheels turn extremely easy so it might be a little hard to control depending on the child's age. My 16-month-old granddaughter handles it just fine though. Only wish is that the bottom had a flat surface (rack) like real grocery carts.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my three year old and holds lots of goodies. Very sturdy and doesn’t tip easily. Smooth rolling and well made. We used it for a Target photo shoot and even the Target employees wanted to know where we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Kahla

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected, it was a big hit with my grandson
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is, when my 2 year old grandson opened it, I was a big hero!!! This shopping cart is near the quality of a real shopping cart. I was surprised and delighted. He kept trying to play with it as I assembled it. He is sooooo happy with it. The little guy is going through a cooking pretend play phase, and this was the ticket. If you wonder if it is worth the cost, yes. In quality and imaginary play for both boys and girls. He's going to have a blast when the weather warms a bit, and he has a little friend over. I love it, and so does my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Dfrost7

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is so great! Got it for my 1 year old for his first birthday because he loves to push things around. He already snuck a quick play in before his birthday to test it out and got mad when we put it up. Easy to put together and study as heck. (I did modify it a little and added bumpers like a real cart. Which looks cool and serves to protect anything he rams it into 😂 )
customer_reviews.author: Babydoll86

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for little girls
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 5 yr old girl. Pros: Easy and quick to put together, strong frame to last a lifetime, looks and works like a real shopping cart, has seat for baby (doll) like the real deal, does not leave marks on my hardwood floors. Cons: None I rinse out real containers after we are done using and give them to daughter to play house and add to her kitchen. Every child that comes over to play no matter what age or gender (2 yr old boy to 8 yr old boy) love to play with this. Hours of fun adding plastic produce and carton milk to the cart and pushing around the house.
customer_reviews.author: wendyebl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This buggy is the cutest sturdiest thing I've ever purchased for my daughter that she can use everywhere on a daily basis. She is 3 years old and excited about taking it to the grocery store. The wheels swivel and there are stabilization bars on the bottom so it will not flip easily. And there are also rubber toppings on the bottom of those bars to keep it from scratching the floor. Very well main product and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Letisha R Hudson

customer_reviews.title: but it worked really good for such a young age just because it's so ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow... that's all I can say... I was surprised that this little cart actually is the quality and sturdiness of a regular shopping cart. I bought it for our one year old granddaughter that loves it. She was barely walking when we gave it to her and we were really concerned that it would be too wobbly for her, but it worked really good for such a young age just because it's so sturdy. I know it's not recommended for such a young age, but I didn't hesitate because because I know the quality of Melissa & Doug products. She will be able to use it for years to come!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made, awesome kids' cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is simply incredible! My 15 mo old grandson will only walk if he is pushing something, then he just takes off. He has a plastic activity center that he uses as a walker, twirls it around and goes all over the house. I think he just does not trust his balance. My daughter thought one of these would be fun for him to take to the store, so he can put a few things in his cart too, and get some more walking in. This cart is as well made as the Publix shopping carts. I can't wait to see the reaction of other shoppers. As with all Melissa & Doug products- it is exceptional!!
customer_reviews.author: Buford

customer_reviews.title: Must-buy for busy toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my niece and nephew who just turned three. Auntie killed it! They absolutely loved them. These kiddos break everything, so I knew I needed sturdy. These carts are steel and very well made. It took me about 2 minutes to assemble each one. I worked in a preschool and we used a lot of Melissa and Doug toys. They are always great quality and safe.
customer_reviews.author: SeahawkGal

customer_reviews.title: Fivr Stars From A Grateful Mama
customer_reviews.text: I bought my special needs toddler a cheap shopping cart months ago, and while he loved it, it came apart over and over again. I read the reviews on this one and I'm so glad I purchased it. Not only is it 3× bigger than the cheap plastic one, but it's well made, sturdy, and he absolutely loves pushing it around for "heavy work," filling his sensory needs. Our house is full of Melissa and Doug products because they seem truly built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Lots of walking!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old son absolutely loves this cart! And I have to say that it is the cutest little shopping cart. As others have said, it's very good quality, and my husband says it was very quick and easy to put together. Before, my son was walking around the house a lot with a learning walker. But he's replaced it with this shopping cart, I think because he's not leaning forward as much (he's a tall baby). He also has fun putting things in the shopping cart. It's so cute, I may just have to bring it to the grocery store with us! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChloeDiego

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality toy you could buy a child!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought several of these for all the little girls in my life. Extremely durable and high quality. Heavy metal construction with a stabilizing bar that stops it from easily tipping. My granddaughter somehow managed to climb into it without it falling over on her. They could last forever. You can’t go wrong with this purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old granddaughter had a great time playing with a shopping cart at Pottery Barn Kids, so I was going to purchase it for her. Another mom recommended Melissa & Doug and I am glad that she did! This one is so much sturdier than the Pottery Barn cart. My granddaughter loves walking around the house and putting stuff in and taking it out of this cart. Excellent product!! ***This is listed as ages 3+. My granddaughter is an early walker. I think it will last her for many years and the way she uses it will change over time.
customer_reviews.author: Fig Newton, RN

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy, could use bumpers.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy cart that will last your child a long time. Our daughter enjoys loading this up and pushing around the house. The two negatives: wheels could be a little better quality, and some pads on the front would protect furniture and ankles. Overall, happy with my purchase. This will last longer than my daughter will be interested.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini shopping cart
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love love love love this! My son has been wanting a shopping cart for a while now. So glad I splurged and got him this one instead of one of the half price plastic ones. This is an exact replica of a real shopping cart. Perfect for his in house grocery store stand or for loading up in the car and taking to the grocery store with you. Will bring fun for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana

customer_reviews.title: better than expected! it’ll last forever :)
customer_reviews.text: two step put together, took me seconds! i bought this for my 4.5 year old and she has had her hands on it since, which is great because although it’s pricey, it is worth every single penny! we have all of our toys from melissa & doug, best bang for your buck if you’re looking for a shopping cart for play, it’ll last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Tatianna R

customer_reviews.title: Remember that show supermarket sweep?
customer_reviews.text: Remember that show supermarket sweep? My daycare kids think they are contestants! they run run run with this thing! Its great quality, but it ends up in the garage most days cuz I'm not the host of that old tv show, and well patience. Its a beautiful cart, made sturdy, looks legit, and I'd buy it again... for a friend's kids. lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmiegiggler

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: I was told by every Grandmother of a little girl To buy this. I just bought this for my Granddaughter who is 2 1/2! She loved it I really like Melissa & Doug products. Very sturdy. She uses it for many purposes. One is putting her little brother in it and transporting him all over the house. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mare1949

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The cutest and tiniest shopping cart ever! My nephew loved it. It shipped fast and I received it within a couple of days of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: I order this for my 14 month old grand daughter.. she is walking fairly good, but not perfect. She LOVES this shopping cart! It is just her size, very strong and sturdy. It DOES NOT TIP OVER, She walks behind the cart pushing it all around the house!! Great little shopping cart!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: So glad i got this and not those plastic ones!
customer_reviews.text: I had been debating to get this cart for a couple of months specially becuase of ifs high price. As soon as i saw this on black friday sale great price i ordered It right away. Assembly was easy and quick and my daughter got so excited she thought it was a real cart and asked us to seat her in it lol! Thats how much it resembles the adult grocery cart! M hoping it lasts us a while and we can take it with us for groceries to keep my daughter entertained!
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Jiwani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is absolutely adorable and extremely sturdy! Assembly was a breeze. You won’t find any other cart built like this.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN COENEN

customer_reviews.title: sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: we had a pottery barn metal grocery cart. And decided it time to get a new one. We got this one because the handles are easier to clean. It is not easy to tip over. The wheels roll smoothly. Putting it together took 5 mins. We kept some white foam cushions for the front bottom racks so my toddler won't runs into furniture. It will hurt if toddler runs over toes. That will happen regardless. I have seen stainless steel groccery carts get rustic but I believe if you don't leave outside and it doesn't get rained on it will stay rustic free.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my son
customer_reviews.text: We had gotten this when he was small to help him walk and even took it to the grocery store with us. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great "tiny cart"!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 yr old granddaughter. She absolutely loves it. It's sturdy, easy to assemble, and has legs to keep it from tipping over. We had to tell her she couldn't climb in it because it was for her dolls. It doesn't fold or disassemble easily for travel or storage, but I think the sturdiness would be affected if it did. Melissa & Doug has done it again!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old had plastic carts from ages 1-2 and finally decided to tone down on plastic/bright colors since it was giving me a headache. Glad I found this, super cute and very durable. My toddler things it’s funny to crash into everything and glad its held up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: JAE

customer_reviews.title: Great little cart.
customer_reviews.text: Great little cart. It's a bit noisy, but my son LOVES pushing this around the house. Rolls easily on hardwood and carpet, and has stoppers so he cannot force it down stairs. The same stoppers mean it's a bit difficult to push through doorways, but that can be a blessing. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Best option out there
customer_reviews.text: By far the safest and best option for a little kid's shopping cart out there. It's basically impossible to tip over, unlike the other toy shopping carts we've seen. The best thing about this is that my son loves to take it with him when we go shopping. He scoots around places like Target with his own little shopping cart and draws a ton of attention from people seeing how cute he is. Just this last weekend, one store employee ran ahead of us to let another employee know we were coming by saying "Want to have your day made?".
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best money I ever spent...
customer_reviews.text: My little one has autism, and one of the current obsessions is shopping carts. I have purchased several of the plastic ones, which are well-loved, but just not close enough to the real thing. This is IT. It is VERY well made, and sturdy as could be. The joy it has given my child has no price. It holds a stuffed friend or doll (just like the real deal), and is as close to the real thing as you can get (and the begging for the real thing has ceased since this awesome cart has come into our house). I cannot recommend this cart highly enough....perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Good for PT walking.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Bought for my special needs 5 years old son. His PT using plastic one. I purchased this one and he loves it. Actually more than his walker. He runs with it all over the house. Shopping cart is stable never flipping up side down. My son able to hold the handle and lift himself to stand up. Highly recommended!!! 5*
customer_reviews.author: Aliya

customer_reviews.title: We got it for him shortly after he turned one and he's now 21 months and still has a lot of fun with it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with this. We got it for him shortly after he turned one and he's now 21 months and still has a lot of fun with it. We have a steep driveway and he has let it go from the top so that it rolls down really fast and often hits a bump and rolls over several times and it has not damaged the shopping cart at all. It's very sturdy and well built so I'm glad I spent a little more and bought this instead of a cheaper plastic one!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cart
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves her own cart. We take it with us to the store and get so many comments. As long as she behaves she loves helping shop. Would be nice if a pole could be added like the ones some stores have so you can help steer without bending over all the time. But at home remove it. Great cart though very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Buzikowski

customer_reviews.title: Seat quality
customer_reviews.text: I normally love all Melissa and Doug products but I was very disappointed with this item. It arrived in time for Christmas but the "seat " was cracked. I needed it to go along with the Melissa & Doug store I was giving my granddaughter for Christmas so I kept it instead of returning due to the time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Liz V

customer_reviews.title: Great cart, where do I get a full sized one?
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to have to put it together, but it’s a simple assembly. It’s well made, and gosh, it doesn’t creak and that one random wheel doesn’t just spin around and around when pushing the cart. Maybe I’ll start bringing it to the grocery store instead of using the ones already there.
customer_reviews.author: XcapeArtix

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: So strong and sturdy and I love the safety feature that is used underneath if your children like climbing in. I’ve bought others in the past but never have I had one I liked this much. The quality far exceeded my expectations and my 4 year old granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Pynkrozez

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME For A New Walker
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this shopping card by Melissa & Doug when visiting my grandson in Los Angeles at the Children's Museum. It is sturdy and very easy for an unsteady new walking one-year old. Found it on Amazon at a great price, included some very cute wooden grocery items for the cart and he loves it. The wheels upfront rotate making it easy for the kids to maneuver. Recommended this to all grandmothers of toddlers I know. Always love and trust Melissa & Doug products but this is a "hit it out of the park" toy! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Best walker on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has helped my 1 year old son learn to walk so much! It's heavy so he can pull himself up on it, and sturdy so it won't fall over. And it's fun to use! He can put his other toys into it and walk around like he's shopping. Great for young children learning to walk and fun for older children who want to play pretend. So happy we made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew and he loves it!! Has had it for 2 years and it’s still going strong! Every kid who comes over always wants to use it. I first saw it at TJ Maxx, but the box was torn. When I looked it up on Amazon, it was even cheaper! I bought it right then and there! Love this brand! Melissa and Doug have great children’s toys and this was super easy to assemble. Only took 2 minutes! I highly recommend this for kids of ages 1-5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and I could tell immediately that this cart was well built. I love the fact that there are bars to help so that the cart won’t tip over because at my daughters current age, she seems to lose her balance easily. I love the fact that she can also put her fav baby doll in the seat to complete her “grocery shopping experience”. My daughter absolutely loves her shopping cart!
customer_reviews.author: Phylicia

customer_reviews.title: The best kid 🛒 shopping cart!
customer_reviews.text: This is my grandkids favorite shopping cart! It is very durable and looks like a real cart! I will definitely purchase more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May damage your walls
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy little cart! This will last until grandkids happen if we don’t let it get rusty lol I can’t see how this toy will ever break unless someone decides to sit where the doll goes in the cart seat. My 20 month old son is a hellion and he’s climbed in and out of the basket, flipped it over, crashed it and will use it to chase the dogs and so far the only damage has been to my walls lol he’s had it since Christmas and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Bastock Family

customer_reviews.title: VERY sturdy, definitely a small version of the real thing
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I was blown away! M&D Still make quality products. VERY sturdy, definitely a small version of the real thing. VERY easy to put together. My daughter loved it. The first shopping cart ($40) we bought her lasted 3 months before she leaned over it, while holding the bar, the metal buckled causing her to bang her face on the other end of the cart...NOT a M&D cart. That will not happen w/this one. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah M

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal  Product and Extremely well made!
customer_reviews.text: Melissa & Doug products are all we buy...for business use and personal use. You can't beat the quality and you can't beat the price. Nothing compares to this shopping cart and it's construction or the thought that went behind making each and every one..It looks and feels like a REAL CART..... I'm hooked! Melissa and Doug ALL THE WAY! You won't be sorry! This is so realistic.. you will be amazed by the high quality!
customer_reviews.author: swters

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like a real shopping cart all metal wire and solid tires!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, very easy to assemble and it’s just like a grocery store cart, exactly! My grand daughter loves it and her mother loads it in the suv for every trip to the store and everyone gets a huge kick out of watching her push her buggy through the grocery store... the minute she unwrapped it, it became the best gift of the day, she wouldn’t stop pushing it around!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Melissa & Doug never disspoints! This is the best grocery cart out there for kid play!
customer_reviews.text: Best quality kids grocery cart out there! So durable and quality made. Our littlies kiddo loves it. We had been playing with one at the play space we go to but decided on this as a birthday gift for our 2 year old. He loves wheeling it around with all the items in our kitchen set. This is a quality product and very easy to put together. Our 12 year old put it together with no issues. Melissa & Doug never disappoints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Don't even waste your money on other kid size shopping carts, this one is the best hands down. Its sturdy, easy to maneuver and assembles in minutes with just 4 simple screws and hex tool which was included. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I reluctantly bought this for my grand daughters for Christmas due to the price. Here it is August and the little girls are still pushing it around and it still looks new ! Built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jule C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my two year old son for his birthday. He and his four year old brother absolutely love it! They play with it every day. They love pushing (and running with it) through the house and putting treasures in it. We even took it on a walk with us around the neighborhood. It was super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent you for any child.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy as well as an enjoyable toy for my grandson. He runs the marathon with this one. It great to see him utilize the carriage in many different ways.
customer_reviews.author: lC

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am impressed. Grocery stores need to take note. This thing is smooth, turns great and better than anything you have ever used at a real store. Granddaughter is 2.5 and perfect for her. Easy to put together and I believe this cart will outlive most if not all of her toys. Very much recommend. I just watched it for a long time until price dropped and snatched it up. Best 30.00 bucks I've spent on toys in a long time
customer_reviews.author: Trina  Peddicord

customer_reviews.title: Very stable
customer_reviews.text: I love the stuffiness and that it doesn't tip when the 2 year old decides to climb in and sit in the seat all by herself. Not that we let her, but little Miss is fearless and has done it 3 times now. Thankfully it hasn't tipped.
customer_reviews.author: Orangeblossum

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, rolls smoothly, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest! Just like the big one Mommy uses at the grocery store. Very sturdy, rolls smoothly, can't say enough this adorable shopping cart. It was a splurge for us, but well worth the money! We've only had ours for a few days and it has quite a few miles on it already. My 3 and 9 year old both enjoy playing with it. It was super easy to put together too! Highly recommend! So glad I made this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Winter

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it !
customer_reviews.text: Super durable and adorable. Definitely recommend buying this over the cheap plastic ones
customer_reviews.author: abbie g.

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for shopping carts this is a good one!
customer_reviews.text: Does my kid LOVE this shopping cart!!!!!!!!???????!!!!!!!!!! In general, he loves getting in carts at the store. We got him this for Christmas and it was the first one he unwrapped and wouldn't open other presents b/c he was too busy playing with this thing. He wanted "IN" the cart, but obviously that wasn't going to happen. He's 2. The cart is really great quality. Very sturdy. It's full of his groceries and he has his huggable Elmo in the baby part and just pushes him all over the house. Cute little cart this one is! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Sevens

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy realistic kid's shopping cart
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shopping cart for my grandkids. It is a very realistic looking cart. The extra supports make it very sturdy. I wasn't able to figure out how to put it together, my husband had to do it. My grandkids love it. They are 21 months and 5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda P.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was quick and easy. Within minutes
customer_reviews.text: My four year old niece lost her mind when she opened this. Assembly was quick and easy. Within minutes, she'd filled it with food and was running around "shopping." I compared it to others online, and of course Melissa and Doug won out. It was more than I wanted to pay but the quality couldn't be beaten.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Crombar

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, simple, and worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and so adorable. It seems very sturdy, it wasn't too difficult to assemble and my 2 year old nephew loves it! I highly recommend it. The only thing I would alter about it is the seat doesn't go all the way down when it is collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality... I decided to upgrade this fantastic little buggy with a can of Gold Rustoleum spray paint😍😍😍. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this heavyweight, realistic-looking stroller! It was the only one that wouldn't tip over when my daughter was learning to walk. Even now she's a great walker now (18 months), the cheap plastic one we were gifted tips over all the time. This one is really sturdy. The only thing that I would have liked, would be if they could have put silicone or foam bumpers on the bottom metal parts. I've read other comments that walls get banged up. I tried putting some foam protectors on myself, but my daughter ripped them all off like a game. It looks so cute with her play kitchen and she loves to play with it every day.
customer_reviews.author: V. Jen

customer_reviews.title: Don't even bother looking at others
customer_reviews.text: This shopping cart is sturdy, well-made, and safe for any child to play with. Our rough and tumble kiddos love this cart. 100% recommend it! We returned a cart that was flimsy and replaced it with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with a Melissa and Doug purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 14 months old and can safely push, load and reload this durable little shopping cart. He is average in height and must reach higher than if I'd purchased one of the plastic molded styles, but I wanted a cart that wouldn't tip over and would last through his preschool years. With that said, there is nothing cuter than a toddler pushing his Elmo in a shopping cart and playing with his pretend grocery items. The Melissa and Doug brand is one you can trust for fun, rigorous, educational play. I spent a little more cash and am very proud of this excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: So Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical to buy this shopping cart, as my daughter who turns 3 in August, is as tall as a 4-5 year old. Once I opened the box, it took maybe a whole 5 minutes to put together. It was so incredibly easy to put together (a total of 4 screws)! My daughter immediately loved it, and I am so glad I purchased it because although she is tall, the cart is not as short as I thought it was. This toy is so awesome! It is made with quality heavy duty products, you won't regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Chonkworld

customer_reviews.title: Like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for my 2 and 4 year old but all the kids love it. My 14 month old uses it to help him walk which I wasn’t expecting. The only thing I can’t stand is the kids slamming it into the wall. Keep in mind, this cart is strong enough to put a hole in one.😉
customer_reviews.author: ThighQueen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 4 year old after visiting a friend who had this and our little one loved it. It’s definitely one of her favorite toys and she loves pushing her dolls around pretending she’s at the store 😍
customer_reviews.author: anon87

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market
customer_reviews.text: I've had other kids shopping carts. They tipped over or fallen apart. This is sturdy and the wheels move great! Truly the best in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Keren

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Who would have thought a little basket would bring so much joy to a little girl. I got this for my 3 year old and she loves it. She puts her dolls up top and pushes it around putting things in her buggy. I’d recommend this all day any day. I also purchased the grocerie items for her to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! A little noisy when the grandkids push on the non carpeted floor. (The kids are noisy with no toys) So durable that I have no fear with them attempting to sit in it as children may try to do! Pricy but you won’t be disappointed. I highly recommend this shopping cart!
customer_reviews.author: dawnyfox

customer_reviews.title: My toddlers love this shopping cart!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very sturdy. My toddlers both love to play with it around the house even months later. We have taken it to Target a few times as well for my 2 year old to use and he was so happy filling his cart with some groceries and helping at the checkout like a big boy! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Roch_Sue

customer_reviews.title: Small but kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing. She pushes it all around the house with all her toys in it, it's like I have a tiny homeless person living in my home. This is a bit smaller than the junior customer baskets you sometimes see at the grocery store. However my 3 year old is quite tall for her age (42+ inches) and it is not too short or small for her. This is a fun toy and great for imaginative play. Save some food containers and boxes and set up your own little shop. Or give her some bags for her toys and cup for spare change. Imagination!
customer_reviews.author: Anelley

customer_reviews.title: We love this shopping cart
customer_reviews.text: We love this shopping cart! I try to avoid plastic toys when possible, as I want longevity since I am just starting my family. We have had this cart for over a year and it gets played with daily (and looks brand new still)! My two year old uses it to cart around his balls, trucks, and trains. We also use it to pick up toys throughout the house to drive back to the playroom. It has tipped over causing my son to fall, but the stoppers prevent it most of the time (and he is pretty rough and runs fast with it so more gentle play won't be an issue).
customer_reviews.author: PFamily

customer_reviews.title: Small and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s strong and sturdy and I’m sure it will last quite awhile but why they actual basket/car part is so small, I do not understand. My kid loves it regardless and if you have kids who play rough(especially boys) this is the cart to buy. Only giving 4/5 stars due to the size... it looks like the cart could’ve been bigger with no issue. The bottom sticks out further than the top(cart)
customer_reviews.author: J. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/scratched
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble and I’m sure my son won’t notice and will love it however, it was damaged when I opened it. Melissa and Doug is a very good company to buy from so I am sure they will make right by the product. I highly suggest spending the extra money and always buy Melissa and Doug.
customer_reviews.author: jack fuller

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this shopping cart
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this shopping cart. When I worked as a nanny the kids had the same one and I knew I wanted it for my daughter. She is just starting to walk and it is perfect. MOST walking toys only move in one direction, straight. This causes frustration when a child can't figure out how to get it out of a position it's in or maneuver it. With the front swivel wheels this isn't an issue. My daughter loves to put her doll in the front seat and off she goes. She will be a year old soon and I see this toy being used for years. `
customer_reviews.author: Sbebb

customer_reviews.title: When they say sturdy.. they mean it!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Great price and is built like a real shopping cart. Love that I don’t have to worry about it breaking. I spent a lot of time searching for toy shopping carts and they were all about this price but built very cheaply. This one definitely give you the most bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel H.

customer_reviews.title: amazon was very easy to work with to replace it
customer_reviews.text: although this product arrived damaged, amazon was very easy to work with to replace it. they even had a new one shipped before i made it to UPS to return the damaged one. this cart is amazing. ive been using a plastic shopping cart for my toddler (since she was a little over 2) to go shopping with. makes groceries a breeze with her when she is helping. she had outgrown the plastic one and so now, we have gotten her this. her face lit up when i opened it. so excited!
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of a shopping cart for my grandchild. I bought the first one for Christmas. It was flimsy, but cute, so I thought it would be okay...Even though it was not roughed up, the handle broke within a few months. This new shopping cart is very sturdy and I'm sure it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy 1973

customer_reviews.title: Best little shopping cart available
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 3-year old granddaughter. It was very easy to assemble, especially for those who tend to view the instruction sheet as a suggestion...like me. It is sturdy enough to last longer and carry much more weight than some of the cheap, plastic carts I could have chosen. The legs in the middle of the cart ensure that even when a child stands on the front bar, the cart won't tip over. I added some Melissa and Doug grocery items, and my granddaughter was delighted with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: ALH

customer_reviews.title: Check for enclosed hardware. It might be missing!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was so excited to receive this cart, until....she opened the box and the hardware was not enclosed! She was so disappointed!! Very disappointed in Melissa and Doug...I heard they were an excellent company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior product! What all toys should model after!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is as close to the one my toddler pushes at the super market! It’s perfect and well made. This is the stuff they used to make in the old days! Thank you Melissa and Doug for superior toys!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great cart.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this cart. It’s so sturdy and can take a lot of abuse from a 3 year old. He will be able to use this for years.
customer_reviews.author: IndyLindy19

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Shopping Cart
product_meta.description:
Design:SingleMelissa & Doug toy shopping cart with sturdy metal frame, play sets & kitchens, heavy-gauge steel construction, 23. 25" H x 11. 75” W x 15" L

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: SMOOTH-ROLLING MINI SHOPPING CART: This mini shopping cart features front, spring-loaded safety wheels that pivot 360 degrees, which permits it to roll easily on multiple surfaces inside the home.
Made to last: the Melissa & Doug toy shopping cart with sturdy metal frame is made from heavy-gauge steel construction that makes it look and feel Just like the real thing.

Handy features for kids: Our shopping cart includes multiple kid-friendly features such as easy-grip handles that let kids push the cart from aisle to aisle, and a fold-open seat for a doll or stuffed animal passenger to go on pretend shopping trips.

Great gift for ages 3-6: the toy shopping cart with sturdy metal frame makes a great gift for kids ages 3 and up. Add the Melissa & Doug Let's play house! Grocery shelf boxes to round out the hands-on, screen-free, pretend shopping experience.

“The gold standard in childhood play”: for more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that nbc news calls “The gold standard in early childhood play. ”

100% happiness : We design Every toy to the highest-quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
